original_text: Recognizing Peter's voice, in her joy she did not open the gate but ran in and reported that Peter was standing at the gate.
korean_text: 베드로의 음성인 줄 알고 기뻐하여 문을 미처 열지 못하고 달려 들어가 말하되 베드로가 대문 밖에 섰더라 하니

sentences.original_text: in her joy she did not open the gate
and reported that Peter was standing at the gate.
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로가 문 앞에 서 있다고 전했습니다
